channel.title: Problem with placing object's with turkish idiots landscape editor
channel.description: So i was using turkish idiot's 3d landscape editor. I was just playing around with it trying to place objects. I right clicked on a tile where a chair was and copied the temp9 and temp10 from the chair and right clicked on a blank tile next to the lumbridge castle and added the temp9 and temp10 to the tile. The red symbol came up saying their was a object their (the chair). I also edited the land to a wooden floor so i could see where i placed it. I saved the tiles and added it to my landscape.rscd. I threw the landscape into my client and server and compiled and ran the server and started the client. I logged in and went to the tile. Their was a wooden floor their but no chair. I went back and looked at the tile in the 3d landscape editor and it still said their was a object their. Does anyone have an idea whats wrong.

item.title: Problem with placing object's with turkish idiots landscape editor
item.dc:creator: @imthenull imthenull
item.description:
@imthenull wrote:

the landscape editor loads an gameobjects.xml.gx(or whatever the compression file name is) from a serperate file that your client runs. objects are not stored in the landscape, but rather hosted on your server.

Read full topic
item.source: Problem with placing object's with turkish idiots landscape editor

item.title: Problem with placing object's with turkish idiots landscape editor
item.dc:creator: @roflcopterofl roflcopterofl
item.description:
@roflcopterofl wrote:

[quote=“bonzakid, post:5, topic:332018”]Is this chair ingame, or in the editor?
If in the editor, remove it, add the chair ingame.[/quote]
Add it in game?

im confused isnt a landscape editor only suppose to edit the landscape not where the objects are…(sorry if i misunderstood)

item.title: Problem with placing object's with turkish idiots landscape editor
item.dc:creator: @bonzakid bonzakid
item.description:
@bonzakid wrote:

roflcopterofl:

So i was using turkish idiot’s 3d landscape editor. I was just playing around with it trying to place objects. I right clicked on a tile where a chair was and copied the temp9 and temp10 from the chair and right clicked on a blank tile next to the lumbridge castle and added the temp9 and temp10 to the tile. The red symbol came up saying their was a object their (the chair). I also edited the land to a wooden floor so i could see where i placed it. I saved the tiles and added it to my landscape.rscd. I threw the landscape into my client and server and compiled and ran the server and started the client. I logged in and went to the tile. Their was a wooden floor their but no chair. I went back and looked at the tile in the 3d landscape editor and it still said their was a object their. Does anyone have an idea whats wrong.

No idea, but you don’t need to compile when you edit landscape files… Or even .xml …

Read full topic
